My Educational Background

My Degree

  • Institute

    Rutgers Business School - New Brunswick

  • Degree Type

    Bachelors

  • Majors

    Comp. Sci. & BAIT (Business Analytics/IT)

  • GPA

    3.948 / 4.0

  • Anticipated Grad. Date

    May 2025 (Curr. Junior)

Relevant Courses

  • Data Structures (Java, OOP, VSCode) - Final Grade: A

    Learned the uses of various Data Structures, such as BST, Heap, Stack, etc. using the Java language

  • Computer Architecture (C, Linux/Unix, Assembly, Binary, Memory) - Final Grade: A

    Implemented projects using the C programmng language. Learned and utilized bit manipulation, binary, caches, and memory. Also used Assembly (Bomb Lab Assignment) and Digital Logic

  • Design & Analysis of Computer Algorithms - Currently Taking

    Learn and Analyze useful algorithms, finding how they work, their uses, principles, and complexity

  • Principles of Programming Languages - Currently Taking

    The study of common concepts familiar to programming languages, such as language paradigms such as logic, OOP, functional programming, etc.

  • Statistical Methods (Excel) - Final Grade: A

    Apply quantitative modeling techniques to data in order to construct and analyze statistical models. Includes variances, regression, etc.
